source.2dc1cafc:
DataSet: DataSet about all the NBA star's Team ,MVP,Roles are playing from 1951 to 2021

Player->Players name
Year ->playing years
Team -> Team Name
Role ->Roles
MVP -> The most valuable player (Y ->"YES" & N ->"NO")
Team.1 ->Team names
